text: Bavanat County () is a county in the Fars Province of Iran. The capital of the county is Surian. At the 2006 census, the county's population was 44,069, in 11,341 families. The county is subdivided into two districts: the Central District and Sarchehan District. The county has four cities: Surian, Korehi, Mazayjan & Hesami. == References == * Gitashenasi Province Atlas of Iran اطلس گیتاشناسی استان‌های ایران ==Other websites== Category:Counties in Fars Province
title: Bavanat County
